```py
def set_header(self):
    title = Label(self,
                  text='Voting for hasthags',
                  font=("Helvetica", 24),
                  height=4)
    title.pack()
```

```py
def start_app(args):
    root = Tk()
    app = Application(hashtags=args.hashtags, master=root)
    app.master.title("Twitter votes")
    app.master.geometry("400x700+100+100")
    app.mainloop()
```
